title: Desperate 'whistleblower' claims
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

The message that the viewing audience should take away from Rep. Adam Schiff and his House Intelligence Committee cronies is just how desperate the Democrats have become because of President Trump’s success as our commander-in-chief (“Intelligence Chairman Schiff: Whistleblower looking to testify,” Web, Sept. 24). They are so desparate, in fact, that they have come before the nation with hatred in their hearts for our country.

Ignorance and dishonesty has been the hallmark of the Democratic House and is on display today. It is a problem of which all Americans should be aware. These elected representatives’ positions have been made abundantly clear.

ALAN CRIBB

Tucker, Ga.
